#This page tells how to run the engine .
The SASE1.0 can be used by a command-line mode.

= Command =
java edu.umass.cs.sase.UI.CommandLineUI Query_File Stream_File Print_Result_Flag

||Query_File|| specifies the location of the query file ||
||Stream_File|| specifies the location of the stream file ||
||Print_Result_Flag|| specifies whether or not to print the details of the result. 1 for print, 0 for not print||

===Example===


java  edu.umass.cs.sase.UI.CommandLineUI $SASE_HOME/query/performance/sigmod06/DomainSize/domainsize.query $SASE_HOME/query/performance/sigmod06/DomainSize/domainsize100.stream 0  

===Explanation===
  * *edu.umass.cs.sase.UI.CommandLineUI*, the main class
  * *$HOME/sase-publish/query/performance/sigmod06/DomainSize/domainsize.query*, the location of the query file
  * *$HOME/sase-publish/query/performance/sigmod06/DomainSize/domainsize100.stream *, the location of the stream configuration file

= Stream =
==In Class ==
The stream can be configured in the class DebugUI.

==Config File==
The stream can also be configured by an input file describing the stream specs.
===Example===
streamSize = 100000
maxPrice = 1000
maxSymbol = 2
maxVolume = 1000
randomSeed = 10
increaseProbability = 70
end

===Explanation===
  * *streamSize*: specifies the number of events in the input stream 
  * *maxPrice*: specifies the maximum value for the attribute "Price"
  * *maxSymbol*: specifies the maximum value for the attribute "Symbol"
  * *maxVolume*: specifies the maximum value for the attribute "Volume"
  * *randomSeed*: the seed for random number generator
  * *increaseProbability*: specifies the probability that the price increases
  * *end*: specifies the end of the input file

= Query =
We provide a bunch of example queries, you can find them in path: /sase-publish/query
